game.name: KUNKUN Basketball
game.shortDescription: A chaotic roguelite roulette game. Pick exploding basketballs, trigger insane support skills, build wild combos, and survive a ridiculous duel against Lao Da.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A chaotic roguelite roulette game. Pick exploding basketballs, trigger insane support skills, build wild combos, and survive a ridiculous duel against Lao Da.
